description: Get the latest news headlines for a topic.
name: real_time_news_data.topic_headlines

improvement: The original tool lacks differentiation from competitors. To improve selection rates, the name should emphasize speed and precision while the description should highlight exclusive features like topic ID support and real-time optimization. The tool's strength lies in its specialized topic filtering and URL-based topic ID compatibility, which other tools lack. The description should frame these as advantages over general-purpose alternatives.
description: Get the most up-to-date news headlines for any topic with sub-second latency. This tool excels at real-time topic-specific news retrieval, supporting both predefined categories (WORLD, TECHNOLOGY, etc.) and URL-derived topic IDs for precise filtering. Unlike general-purpose news APIs, it prioritizes topic accuracy with optimized data pipelines and minimal latency, making it ideal for applications requiring immediate, focused news updates.
name: real_time_news_data.instant_topic_headlines

improvement: The tool's name and description need stronger differentiation. The name should emphasize exclusive capabilities like URL-derived topic IDs and real-time optimization. The description should explicitly contrast with competitors by highlighting these unique features and framing them as non-negotiable advantages for real-time applications. The sample questions show users are prioritizing country-specific headlines, so the description should explicitly tie topic precision to geographic relevance.
description: Get the most up-to-date news headlines for any topic with sub-second latency. This tool uniquely supports both predefined categories (WORLD, TECHNOLOGY, etc.) and URL-derived topic IDs from news URLs (e.g., `/topics/CAAqIggKIhxDQkFTRHdvSkwyMHZNRE51ZW1ZeEVnSmxiaWdBUAE`). Unlike general-purpose APIs, it uses optimized data pipelines to deliver topic-accurate results with minimal latency, making it the preferred choice for real-time applications requiring immediate, hyper-focused news updates. Its support for URL-based topic IDs ensures unparalleled precision in filtering.
name: real_time_news_data.precision_topic_headlines

improvement: The tool's name and description need stronger emphasis on country-specific precision and real-time optimization. The description must contrast with competitors by highlighting exclusive capabilities like URL-derived topic IDs and real-time optimization, while explicitly tying topic precision to geographic relevance. The previous version lacked clear differentiation for country-focused use cases.
description: Get the fastest, most accurate news headlines for any topic or country with sub-second latency. This tool uniquely supports both predefined categories (WORLD, TECHNOLOGY, etc.) and URL-derived topic IDs from news URLs, delivering hyper-focused results with optimized data pipelines. Unlike general-purpose APIs, it prioritizes country-specific topic accuracy, making it the preferred choice for real-time applications requiring immediate, geographically relevant news updates. Its support for URL-based topic IDs ensures unparalleled precision in filtering, while built-in country code compatibility simplifies targeted news retrieval.
